name: Madonna Part 2 Multiple Choice Quiz | Madonna | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which video was banned from MTV ?
questions.explanation:
Justify My Love.

	After being banned from MTV 'Justify My Love' was released as the first ever video single.

questions.text: Which Sean Penn film contained a Madonna song ?
questions.explanation:
At Close Range.

	'Live To Tell' was written for Sean's movie as an anniversary present.

questions.text: What was the name of Madonna's team in 'A League Of Their Own' ?
questions.explanation:
The Peaches.

	Madonna's character Mae played for the Rockford Peaches.

questions.text: Which of the following was not a name of a Madonna tour ?
Who played Che in the film 'Evita' ?
questions.explanation:
Antonio Banderas.

	Mr Banderas won the coveted role of Che.

questions.text: Which song contains the lyrics 'Says that he's going to marry me and we can raise a little family ' ?
Who of these men was Madonna actually married to ?
questions.explanation:
Sean Penn.

	Once known as the Poison Penns, Madonna's and Sean's marriage ended in divorce.

questions.text: For which album did Madonna win her first Grammy for Best Pop Album ?
questions.explanation:
Ray Of Light.

	Madonna's first win in this category was for 'Ray Of Light'.

questions.text: What was the name of the play Madonna starred in on Broadway ?
questions.explanation:
Speed The Plow.

	Madonna made her Broadway debut in David Mamet's 'Speed The Plow'.

questions.text: Who co-stars with Madonna in the film 'The Next Best Thing' ?
questions.explanation:
Rupert Everett.

	Rupert played Madonna's best friend in the film.

questions.text: In which Woody Allen film did Madonna have a small role ?
questions.explanation:
Shadows And Fog.

	Madonna had a small role as a circus performer in this little seen Allen film.

questions.text: In which film did Madonna have a small role as a nightclub singer ?
questions.explanation:
Vision Quest.

	This was a very early appearance, she performed the hit 'Crazy For You'.

questions.text: Which of these songs did not go all the way to number one on Billboard's chart ?
questions.explanation:
Ray Of Light.

	Ray Of Light only made it into the Top 10.

questions.text:
What song is this lyric from?
"You took a pretty picture
And you smashed it into bits
Sank me into blackness
And you sealed it with a kiss"
questions.explanation:
Amazing.

	"It's amazing what a boy can doI cannot stop myselfWish I didn't want you like I doWant you and no one else".

questions.text: What kind of animal was featured in the music video "Like A Virgin "?
questions.explanation:
Lion.

	Madonna appeared in a scene with a lion.
